relevant_findings.general: Complaint of pain, no acute distress.
relevant_findings.neck: No lymphadenopathy, no jugular venous distention.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Tender to palpation diffusely, no guarding or rebound tenderness, no palpable mass.

ultrasound.multiple_hypoechoic_foci: Dominant focus measures 2.8 x 1.6 x 2.3 cm, unchanged to slightly decreased size.
ultrasound.hemangioma: Stable 1.6 x 1.6 x 1.1 cm echogenic focus in the right lobe.
ultrasound.gallbladder: Wall thickened up to 0.5 cm, irregular internal echoes likely representing sludge.
ultrasound.pancreatic_duct: Stable dilation up to 0.7 cm, no focal lesions visualized.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Stable findings with slight size decrease of dominant lesion and decreased pericholecystic fluid.
